channel.title: Multizone problem
channel.description: oke so i wanted to add a multizone so i can attack an npc with more people. i changed it in player.java and in npc.java but still i cant attack it with more then 1 player. please help me!

item.title: Multizone problem
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

make sure your defining the area correct, make it so its like this

(absX >= [b]SWXX[/b] && absX <= [b]NEXX[/b] && absY >= [b]SWYY[/b] && absY <= [b]NEYY[/b]) ||

SWXX = south west x coord
NEXX = north east x coord
SWYY = south west y coord
NEYY = north east 7 coord

This draws a box and anything inside is multi

Read full topic
